app.title: Fillr
app.tagline: Create files of exact size, as needed

txt.label: Text (.txt)
txt.algorithm: Generates a text file filled with zero bytes

csv.label: CSV Table (.csv)
csv.algorithm: Generates CSV file with dummy data including ID, name, email, phone, and address

png.label: PNG Image (.png)
png.algorithm: Creates a 1x1 transparent image and adjusts size with comment chunks

pdf.label: PDF Document (.pdf)
pdf.algorithm: Creates a basic PDF document and adds comment lines for size adjustment

mp3.label: MP3 Audio (.mp3)
mp3.algorithm: Generates silent MP3 file and adjusts size with metadata and padding

mp4.label: MP4 Video (.mp4)
mp4.algorithm: Creates a 1x1 black screen video and adjusts size with metadata

algorithm.title: Generation Method
algorithm.description: TXT: Zero-filled / CSV: Dummy data generation / PNG: 1x1 transparent / PDF: Comment padding / MP3: Silent audio / MP4: Black screen video

exactSize.title: Exact Size
exactSize.description: Generates files with exactly the specified byte count

private.title: Private
private.description: All processing is done in the browser, nothing sent to servers

fast.title: Fast
fast.description: Memory-efficient chunked generation handles large files quickly

formats.title: Format Support
formats.description: Supports TXT, CSV, PNG, PDF, MP3, MP4 formats

footer.purpose: Perfect for development and testing dummy file generation

errors.sizeZero: File size must be greater than 0
errors.sizeTooLarge: File size is limited to 10 GiB
errors.generationFailed: An error occurred during file generation
